programme.title: Water for Elephants, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A shared compassion for a special elephant draws together a former veterinary student (Robert Pattinson) and a performer (Reese Witherspoon) in the traveling circus in which they both work.

programme.title: Triple 9, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Criminals and some crooked cops hatch a devious scheme to use an honest lawman as a pawn for a heist.

programme.title: Problemista, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Alejandro, an aspiring toy designer from El Salvador, tries to bring his fanciful ideas to life and chase his dream in New York City with the help of his erratic employer.

programme.title: Priscilla, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: When teenage Priscilla Beaulieu meets Elvis Presley at a party, the man who is already a meteoric rock 'n' roll superstar becomes someone entirely unexpected in private moments: a thrilling crush, an ally in loneliness, a vulnerable best friend.

programme.title: Superman: Red Son, (2020, Animated)
programme.desc: An alternate take on Superman portrays him as a Soviet hero after his rocket lands in the USSR.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A young swordsman (Logan Lerman) joins three of France's finest warriors in a quest to foil a plot against the crown.

programme.title: Dream Scenario, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: A family man finds his life turned upside down when millions of strangers suddenly start seeing him in their dreams. However, when his nighttime appearances take a nightmarish turn, he's forced to navigate the consequences of his newfound stardom.

programme.title: Wilson, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: After reuniting with his ex-wife (Laura Dern), a lonely and neurotic misanthrope (Woody Harrelson) tries to form a connection with the teenage daughter (Isabella Amara) he never knew he had.

programme.title: A Bigger Splash, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: While vacationing on a Sicilian island with her boyfriend (Matthias Schoenaerts), a rock star (Tilda Swinton) receives an unexpected visit from an old flame (Ralph Fiennes) and his seductive daughter (Dakota Johnson).

programme.title: Edge of Darkness, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: After his daughter is shot on his doorstep, a Boston detective (Mel Gibson) learns about her secret life and a far-reaching coverup linked to her death.

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

programme.title: Candyman: Farewell to the Flesh, (1995, Horror)
programme.desc: The daughter (Kelly Rowan) of a New Orleans aristocrat ties his murder to the legend of an artist (Tony Todd) fitted with a hook.

programme.title: Son of Godzilla, (1967, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist's (Tadao Takashima) experiments heat up an island as well as Godzilla's egg, hatching a son, Minya.

programme.title: The Water Diviner, (2014, History)
programme.desc: Four years after the Battle of Gallipoli in World War I, an Australian farmer (Russell Crowe) travels to Turkey to scour the battlefield for the bodies of his three missing sons.

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A genetically engineered soldier (Channing Tatum) informs an ordinary woman (Mila Kunis) of her destiny as the next recipient of an extraordinary inheritance that could alter the balance of the cosmos.

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A genetically engineered soldier (Channing Tatum) informs an ordinary woman (Mila Kunis) of her destiny as the next recipient of an extraordinary inheritance that could alter the balance of the cosmos.

programme.title: Superman: Red Son, (2020, Animated)
programme.desc: An alternate take on Superman portrays him as a Soviet hero after his rocket lands in the USSR.

programme.title: Get a Job, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A young man (Miles Teller) and his girlfriend (Anna Kendrick) struggle to find desirable employment after graduating from college.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: London publicist Edina Monsoon and best friend Patsy Stone flee to the French Riviera after accidentally knocking supermodel Kate Moss into the River Thames.

programme.title: The Boss, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: After her release from prison, a former CEO (Melissa McCarthy) battles old enemies while trying to build a brownie empire with her ex-assistant (Kristen Bell).

programme.title: Fantastic Planet, (1973, Animated)
programme.desc: The 39-foot-tall pastel Draags keep leashes on the Oms, their tiny pets descended from humans.

programme.title: The Zone of Interest, (2023, History)
programme.desc: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Hss, and his wife, Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

programme.title: The Daytrippers, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Family members (Pat McNamara, Anne Meara) join a woman (Hope Davis) on an odyssey to confront her husband about a love letter addressed to him.

programme.title: Kicks, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A 15-year-old (Jahking Guillory) recruits his two best friends (Christopher Meyer, Christopher Jordan Wallace) to help him retrieve his stolen Air Jordan sneakers from a neighborhood thug (Kofi Siriboe).

programme.title: Mississippi Masala, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: People resent the romance of a black man (Denzel Washington) and an Indian woman (Sarita Choudhury) in a Mississippi town.

programme.title: Unstoppable, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: When an unmanned locomotive roars out of control, two railroad employees (Denzel Washington, Chris Pine) must find a way to bring it to a halt before it crashes and spills its toxic cargo.

programme.title: Walkabout, (1971, Adventure)
programme.desc: A lost teenager (Jenny Agutter) and her little brother (Lucien John) meet an Aboriginal teen (David Gulpilil) in the Outback.

programme.title: Save Yourselves!, (2020, Comedy)
programme.desc: A young Brooklyn couple head to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.

programme.title: A United Kingdom, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In the 1940s, Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana shocks the world when he marries a white woman from London.

programme.title: For All Mankind, (1989, Documentary)
programme.desc: A unique view of the moon is made possible through film taken by the Apollo astronauts who landed on the surface.

programme.title: For All Mankind, (1989, Documentary)
programme.desc: A unique view of the moon is made possible through film taken by the Apollo astronauts who landed on the surface.

programme.title: The Flash, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Worlds collide when the Flash travels back in time to change the events of the past. However, when his attempt to save his family alters the future, he becomes trapped in a reality in which General Zod has returned, threatening annihilation.

programme.title: Out of the Furnace, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: A steelworker (Christian Bale) takes matters into his own hands when his brother (Casey Affleck) joins one of the Northeast's most-ruthless crime syndicates, then disappears.

programme.title: Oracle, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman accepts a job on a property with a traumatic past. Upon her arrival, she soon realizes that the nightmares of her childhood are connected to the evil in the house.

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After actions trigger the loss of an old woman's home, an ambitious loan officer finds herself the victim of a powerful curse that will damn her soul for eternity.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Professor X (James McAvoy) and Raven (Jennifer Lawrence) lead a team of young X-Men to stop the immortal mutant Apocalypse (Oscar Isaac) from destroying mankind.

programme.title: Tiny Furniture, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: After breaking up with her boyfriend, a recent college graduate (Lena Dunham) moves back in with family while she tries to figure out the next step in life.

programme.title: What's Your Number?, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A pessimistic magazine article prompts an unmarried woman to revisit her numerous ex-boyfriends to find out if one of them could be her true love.

programme.title: Fantastic Planet, (1973, Animated)
programme.desc: The 39-foot-tall pastel Draags keep leashes on the Oms, their tiny pets descended from humans.

programme.title: Fantastic Planet, (1973, Animated)
programme.desc: The 39-foot-tall pastel Draags keep leashes on the Oms, their tiny pets descended from humans.

programme.title: The Return of Godzilla, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Okumura witnesses a huge monster during a storm. Biologist Hayashida hears Okumura's story from Toto Nippo reporter Maki and concludes that Godzilla, who was buried 30 years ago, has come back to life. Godzilla then appears in Tokyo Bay.

programme.title: The Bling Ring, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: A teenager (Israel Broussard) and his gang of fame-obsessed youths (Katie Chang, Taissa Farmiga) use the Internet to track the whereabouts of celebrities, then rob their homes.

programme.title: Son of Godzilla, (1967, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist's (Tadao Takashima) experiments heat up an island as well as Godzilla's egg, hatching a son, Minya.

programme.title: Rodan, (1957, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A bug-eating pterodactyl flies out of a coal mine and wrecks Japan with sonic booms.

programme.title: Mississippi Masala, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: People resent the romance of a black man (Denzel Washington) and an Indian woman (Sarita Choudhury) in a Mississippi town.

programme.title: Beowulf, (2007, Animated)
programme.desc: After destroying the demon Grendel, a mighty warrior (Ray Winstone) faces an even-more-potent enemy in the form of its seductive, vengeful mother (Angelina Jolie).

programme.title: Superman: Man of Tomorrow, (2020, Animated)
programme.desc: Young Clark Kent works as an intern at the Daily Planet while learning how to save the city of Metropolis.

programme.title: Time Bandits, (1981, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Cosmic dwarfs take a boy on an odyssey featuring Robin Hood (John Cleese), Napoleon, King Agamemnon (Sean Connery).

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the nations of Earth collaborate on an immense defense program to protect the planet. When the aliens attack with unprecedented force, only the ingenuity of a few brave men and women can save the world.

programme.title: Working Girls, (1986, Drama)
programme.desc: A photographer (Louise Smith) and others work for a yuppie madam (Ellen McElduff) in a Manhattan brothel, then go home.

programme.title: A Cure for Wellness, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After traveling to a remote location in the Swiss Alps, a Wall Street stockbroker (Dane DeHaan) unravels the terrifying secrets of a mysterious spa where guests never leave.

programme.title: Martha Marcy May Marlene, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: After escaping from a cult, a young woman (Elizabeth Olsen) is haunted by her experiences there and fears that its vicious leader (John Hawkes) may be trying to find her.

programme.title: Hercules, (2014, Adventure)
programme.desc: Now a traveling mercenary, Hercules must once again become a hero to help the benevolent king of Thrace protect his people from a powerful warlord.

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A nurse (Pam Grier) takes revenge on a drug ring for the slaying of her undercover-officer boyfriend.

programme.title: Saint Maud, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Maud, an unstable, newly devout hospice nurse, becomes obsessed with saving her dying patient's soul -- but sinister forces and her own sinful past threaten her holy calling.

programme.title: Our Kind of Traitor, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A money launderer (Stellan Skarsgard) for Russian gangsters asks a couple vacationing in Marrakech, Morocco, to deliver incriminating evidence to an MI6 agent (Damian Lewis).

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, War)
programme.desc: In 1944 Lt. Col. Henry Mucci (Benjamin Bratt) leads a U.S. battalion to rescue more than 500 prisoners of war from a Japanese camp.

programme.title: RoboCop 3, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The cyborg policeman (Robert John Burke) takes to the air to defend a run-down neighborhood from a Japanese tycoon.

programme.title: Ben-Hur, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: A prince (Jack Huston) endures years of slavery to take vengeance on his adopted brother (Toby Kebbell), a Roman officer who falsely accused him of treason.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Guy Pearce) travels into the future and meets a race of people who fear hideous monsters living under the ground.

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teen taps his computer into the NORAD missile-defense system and plays a video game, "Global Thermonuclear War.".

programme.title: Godfather of Harlem
programme.desc: An attack on Bumpy's family forces him to team up with unlikely allies to retaliate against Joe Colombo; Margaret stays with Elise and the Panthers and helps Jerome; Pino betrays Stella; Colombo plans a Civil Rights rally in Central Park.

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: As a comet is on a collision course with earth, humans have to prepare for their survival. They randomly select eight hundred thousand people to be saved in order to keep the human race alive.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A series of unexplained events follows a horrifying train derailment, leading some young filmmakers (Elle Fanning, Joel Courtney) to suspect that the catastrophe was not an accident.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men (John Goodman, John Gallagher Jr.).

programme.title: The Amityville Horror, (1979, Horror)
programme.desc: A couple (James Brolin, Margot Kidder) battle a demonic presence in their new home, the location of many gruesome murders a year earlier.

programme.title: Godfather of Harlem
programme.desc: An attack on Bumpy's family forces him to team up with unlikely allies to retaliate against Joe Colombo; Margaret stays with Elise and the Panthers and helps Jerome; Pino betrays Stella; Colombo plans a Civil Rights rally in Central Park.

programme.title: No Stranger Than Love, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: After his girlfriend is kidnapped while on vacation, an American man is forced to smuggle cocaine over the border. If he's ever to see her alive again, he'll have to navigate a treacherous underworld of violence and greed.

programme.title: No Stranger Than Love, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: After his girlfriend is kidnapped while on vacation, an American man is forced to smuggle cocaine over the border. If he's ever to see her alive again, he'll have to navigate a treacherous underworld of violence and greed.

programme.title: The Secret of NIMH, (1982, Animated)
programme.desc: A society of genetically altered rats comes to the aid of a mouse whose family is threatened by civilization.

programme.title: Disturbing Behavior, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: High-school students (James Marsden, Katie Holmes, Nick Stahl) suspect that sinister forces are controlling their too-perfect classmates.

programme.title: Mo' Better Blues, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Music comes first for a Manhattan jazzman (Denzel Washington) with one too many lovers and a manager (Spike Lee) who gambles.

programme.title: Zoolander, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A supermodel (Ben Stiller) befriends a rival (Owen Wilson) while becoming mixed-up in a brainwashing and assassination plot.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: A San Francisco widower (Mark Ruffalo) falls in love with a ghostly doctor (Reese Witherspoon) while subletting her apartment.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Heavenly executive Mr. Jordan allows an angry quarterback (Warren Beatty), taken before his time, to return to Earth as a millionaire.

programme.title: Overboard, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: A yachtsman's (Edward Herrmann) wife (Goldie Hawn) falls overboard, forgets who she is and becomes an Oregon carpenter's (Kurt Russell) mate.

programme.title: Teen Wolf, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: A high-school student's popularity soars when it is discovered that he is cursed with the mark of the werewolf.

programme.title: Superbad, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Separation anxiety poses a problem for two co-dependent high school seniors who hope to score booze and babes at a party.

programme.title: How It Ends, (2021, Comedy)
programme.desc: A woman scores an invite to one last wild party before the world ends. However, making it there won't be easy after her car is stolen and the clock is ticking on her plan to tie up loose ends with friends and family.

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: A film-loving loan shark (John Travolta) teams with a B-movie producer (Gene Hackman) to become a Hollywood mogul.

programme.title: Godfather of Harlem
programme.desc: Without the St. Clair, Bumpy's forced to bring an old enemy back to Harlem to take care of Joe Colombo; Omar gets the name of one of Malcolm's shooters and the Panthers investigate; Mayme's invited to Truman Capote's Black & White Ball.

programme.title: Godfather of Harlem
programme.desc: An attack on Bumpy's family forces him to team up with unlikely allies to retaliate against Joe Colombo; Margaret stays with Elise and the Panthers and helps Jerome; Pino betrays Stella; Colombo plans a Civil Rights rally in Central Park.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: There is more than meets the eye with Alabama native Rocky Dale Davis; people are quick to misjudge him as a typical Southern white boy, but Rocky has a progressive outlook in his comedy.

programme.title: The Madness of King George, (1994, History)
programme.desc: The 18th-century British monarch (Nigel Hawthorne) loves his devoted queen (Helen Mirren) but illness dramatically affects his mind.

programme.title: The Madness of King George, (1994, History)
programme.desc: The 18th-century British monarch (Nigel Hawthorne) loves his devoted queen (Helen Mirren) but illness dramatically affects his mind.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: An eccentric gunfighter (Marlon Brando) for hire must protect a cattle baron's herd from a rustler (Jack Nicholson) and his gang.

programme.title: Torn Hearts, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: A country music duo seek out the private mansion of their idol and end up in a twisted series of horrors that force them to confront the limits they'd go for their dreams.

programme.title: Child's Play, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: Two teachers (James Mason, Robert Preston) breed violence at a boys boarding school, with a gym teacher (Beau Bridges) in the middle.

programme.title: Doubt, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: Suspicions of child abuse fuel a traditionalist nun's (Meryl Streep) personal crusade against a popular priest (Philip Seymour Hoffman) who wants to reform her school's strict customs.

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Intent on drinking himself to death, a man (Nicolas Cage) who has lost everything finds solace with a Las Vegas hooker (Elisabeth Shue).

programme.title: The Hours, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Dreamgirls, (2006, Musical)
programme.desc: After an ambitious manager (Jamie Foxx) gives them a shot at stardom, three singers learn that fame can carry a high personal cost.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A slain Manhattan yuppie (Patrick Swayze) reaches out to his lover (Demi Moore), with a medium (Whoopi Goldberg) as his middlewoman.

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lawyer (Matthew McConaughey) who operates out of the back of his Lincoln Continental lands the case of a lifetime when he defends a Beverly Hills playboy accused of attempted murder.

programme.title: Challengers, (2024, Drama)

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: When Indiana native Everett Case arrives in Raleigh to become the coach at North Carolina State, his vision spearheads not just the rise of college basketball at his school and in the region, but the start of a conference that will change the sport.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: From Frank McGuire to Bones McKinney and Vic Bubas, new coaches emerge to challenge the early success of Everett Case. It all precedes a final poignant moment of triumph for Case at the only home the ACC Tournament has, until this point, ever known.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: After a rough start, North Carolina's Dean Smith comes to be known for both dominance and dignity, playing a central role in desegregating the ACC with the recruitment of Charlie Scott, who emerges as a star on some of Smith's greatest teams.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: An intense and high-impact rivalry develops between Maryland and North Carolina State, capped by the finale of the 1974 ACC Tournament in arguably the greatest college basketball game ever - and a battle that helps shape the future of the sport.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: Dean Smith's North Carolina teams may be the class of the ACC, but rivals also flourish, including a Virginia team led by Wally Walker, and a Duke program that re-emerges with a championship run in 1978 and a controversial title two years later.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: Virginia's Ralph Sampson earns national player of the year honors three times, but never wins the ACC Tournament. Dean Smith seeks a title with freshman Michael Jordan, and the charismatic Jim Valvano leads NC State on a memorable Cinderella run.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: After previous ACC Tournament heartbreaks, Maryland's Lefty Driesell and Georgia Tech's Bobby Cremins both seek redemption. All the while, Mike Krzyzewski survives early calls for his job and helps turn up the heat on the Duke-Carolina rivalry.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: At Duke, Coach K puts together one of the most iconic teams ever with Christian Laettner, Grant Hill and Bobby Hurley. Wake Forest seeks a return to glory led by Randolph Childress and Tim Duncan, and Dean Smith's career ends in memorable fashion.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: As a new century dawns, Duke is more dominant than ever, winning seven ACC championships in eight years with a core of stars headlined by Shane Battier and Jay Williams. Roy Williams rejuvenates the Carolina program, while Clemson remains snake bit.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: The changing college sports landscape brings the conference to 15 schools, with Florida State, Miami and Notre Dame earning their first ACC championships. Tony Bennett and Zion Williamson each bring new excitement before the unimaginable happens.

programme.desc: Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e sua irm Himawari esperam ansiosamente pelo Dia de Pais e Filhos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto se depara com um concurso de comida organizado por restaurantes conhecidos da Folha para o Dia de Pais e Filhos.
programme.sub-title: Uma grande poro! O concurso de comida!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto encontra Sasuke, seu professor, que voltou para a aldeia aps um longo perodo ausente.
programme.sub-title: Tticas para se dar bem com a sua filha

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com medo de atrapalhar as misses, Namida decide parar de chorar para evitar que seu jutsu seja ativado acidentalmente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Buscando melhorar a reputao do Cl Nara, um ancio do cl diz para Shikadai desistir de se tornar um ninja e virar um poltico.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Pssaros esto atacando os residentes de uma aldeia nos arredores Pas do Fogo. As equipes de Boruto e Sumire recebem uma misso em conjunto de identificar a causa dos ataques.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Seguindo as informaes dos aldees, Boruto e Sarada vo ao encontro de Jugo. No entanto, ao chegarem no local, o encontram transformado em um monstro feroz e sofrendo com os efeitos da Marca da Maldio.
programme.sub-title: Jugo e a Marca da Maldio

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Seguindo as ordens de Konohamaru, Sumire e o resto da Equipe 15 voltam para relatar a situao, mas no caminho so atacados por um inimigo misterioso.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sumire consegue fugir com a ajuda de Nue e sai em busca de Wasabi e Namida quando, de repente, Jugo, Suigetsu e Karin aparecem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada e Karin tm dificuldades para lutar contra um inimigo que tem o poder de manipular livremente a Marca da Maldio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Suigetsu querem ajudar Jugo, mas no conseguem por conta dos sedativos que receberam. Enquanto isso, os pssaros com a Marca da Maldio comeam a se juntar e migrar!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A Equipe 7 enviada em uma misso para ajudar a capturar um ladro de joias, mas acaba perdendo o rastro dele.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mitsuki se sente mal e decide passar no centro de pesquisa de Orochimaru. Mitsuki explica a Orochimaru que nunca teve sonhos enquanto dormia, mas que recentemente passou a sonhar.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai Sarutobi, prima de Konohamaru, incumbida de escoltar Kakashi, o Sexto Hokage, e seu amigo Might Guy at as fontes termais.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A misso de ranque S!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai e companhia chegam nas fontes termais na fronteira do Pas do Fogo com o Pas do Vapor, mas Mirai, que est sempre focada no trabalho, no consegue relaxar!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A guerra de ces e gatos!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps alguns dias de misso, Mirai vai nas fontes termais com Tenten, uma ex-aluna de Guy, mas o momento relaxante interrompido quando Guy grita que viu um fantasma.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O hotel amaldioado!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai, Kakashi e Guy viajam com Tatsumi para uma aldeia com uma fonte termal secreta, mas descobrem que a fonte foi tapada com uma pedra!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: Batatinhas e a pedra gigante!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Comovida com os esforos de Tatsumi para cumprir seu objetivo sozinha, Mirai decide dar uma pausa em sua misso e ajud-la.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: guas termais da ressurreio!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O rei da Mirai!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Naruto e Shikamaru debatem sobre o que fazer com os participantes da Prova Chunin que no puderam concluir devido ao ataque dos Otsutsuki. Sasuke retorna e busca por pistas do Cl Otsutsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com Shikadai como capito, Boruto, Iwabe e Wasabi formam uma equipe especial e saem em busca de uma flor rara que floresce por pouco tempo.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos se tornam vidos colecionadores das Cartas Ninja Extremas, mas percebem que ainda no tm a carta de Shino Aburame, seu professor, nem de Rock Lee, o pai de Metal!
programme.sub-title: Guerra por Procurao das Cartas X!

programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Evil Under the Sun, (1982, Crime)
programme.desc: Agatha Christie detective Hercule Poirot returns in this 'sleekly designed whodunit' set in a posh island resort.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Ten Little Indians, (1989, Thriller)
programme.desc: This classic whodunit by mystery maven Agatha Christie is played out in a remote African safari bush camp, where a diverse group of intriguing characters fall victim, one by one, to an unknown, unseen assailant.

programme.title: The Private Life Of Sherlock Holmes, (1970, Thriller)
programme.desc: When a beautiful woman claims that her husband has disappeared, the investigation takes Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson to Scotland, where they uncover a plot involving a clandestine society, Her Majesty's Secret Service... and the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Indiscreet, (1958, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Cary Grant is the suave American diplomat who pretends to be married in order to preserve his bachelor status. Ingrid Bergman is the glamorous leading lady of the London stage who has no scruples about having an affair with a married man.

programme.title: Houseboat, (1958, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: This Oscar-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: Along Came Jones, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: The Pride of the Yankees, (1942, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: The story of the life and career of famed baseball player Lou Gehrig.

programme.title: High Noon, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper won the Oscar for the Best Actor in this classic tale of a lawman who stands alone to defend a town of cowardly citizens against a gang of revenge-seeking criminals.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation, (2018, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)

programme.title: Soul Plane, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: After a humiliating experience on an airplane, Nashawn sues the airline and is awarded a huge settlement. Determined to make good with the money, Nashawn creates the full service airline of his dreams, complete with sexy stewardesses & funky music.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat's back on! And Eddie Murphy is cool as ever in this sizzling, smash-hit sequel to Beverly Hills Cop.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1993, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Eddie's back! So are the laughs. Eddie Murphy returns as Detroit cop Axel Foley, getting down with the fun-and-sun set as never before in this revved up thrill-ride of a movie.

programme.title: Boyz n the Hood, (1991, Crime)
programme.desc: Three friends struggle to survive in South Central Los Angeles where friendship, pain, danger, and love form a true picture of life in the 'hood in this critically acclaimed, action-filled story.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Game of Death, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: Billy Lo, a champion fighter and movie star, fakes his death to escape and then expose the crime syndicate that wants to control him.

programme.title: When Taekwondo Strikes [English-Language Version], (1973, Action)
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Korea in the 1930's, the leader of a small resistance movement attempts to get information to sympathizers in China.

programme.title: Karate Killer, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Kiba is back again, but this time he has fallen from grace and sent to prison for all the violent acts he has committed. Once he's out, he begins working as a bodyguard in a club that is crawling with gangsters.

programme.title: Slaughter In San Francisco [English-Language Version], (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A Chinese-American cop, skilled in martial arts, battles the most powerful criminal gang in San Francisco that is responsible for the death of his partner.

programme.title: Good Guys Wear Black, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Chuck Norris stars as John T. Booker, the former leader of an elite commando unit who must uncover the reason why his former squad members are being systematically murdered one by one. Anne Archer and James Franciscus co-star.

programme.title: A Force Of One, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: In this thrill-a-minute film, action superstar Chuck Norris stars as a martial arts champion enlisted to help track down a serial killer...and the man responsible for the murder of his adoptive son. Jennifer O'Neill and Clu Gulager also star.

programme.title: The Octagon, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Chuck Norris is back in this action-packed martial arts showcase co-starring the legendary Lee Van Cleef. Norris takes on his adoptive brother and a training camp where terrorists are being taught the secret killing techniques of the ninja!

programme.title: An Eye For An Eye, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: A SFPD undercover narcotics cop aims to avenge his partner's death and destroy a drug-smuggling ring operated by the Chinese Triads.

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Shirley MacLaine, Gene Hackman, Dennis Quaid and Richard Dreyfuss star in Mike Nichols' hilarious blockbuster film about a very real mother-daughter relationship set against the backdrop of today's Hollywood. Rated: R

programme.title: Obvious Child, (2014, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A one night stand leaves a woman (Jenny Slate) with an unexpected surprise just in time for Valentine's Day in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy that has critics audiences raving.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure, (1989, Screwball)
programme.desc: Our non-heinous heroes Bill (Alex Winter) and Ted (Keanu Reeves) are in danger of flunking history! But when the righteous Rufus (George Carlin) arrives in a time-travelling phone booth, the dense dudes discover their destiny!

programme.title: Hollywood Homicide, (2003, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A pair of detectives investigate a murder while pursuing their other full-time professions. Welcome to Hollywood Homicide - the only place where you can come to work hungry, horny, thirsty, and broke, and resolve all four by the end of the watch.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Screwball)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: Mystery Team, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: They were kid detectives. Now they're 18 and still solving child crimes. But when The Mystery Team is challenged to crack a murder case, they see an opportunity to finally prove themselves as real detectives once and for all.

programme.title: Safety Not Guaranteed, (2012, Screwball)
programme.desc: When an unusual ad inspires three cynical Seattle magazine employees to look for the story behind it, they discover a mysterious eccentric named Kenneth, a likable but paranoid supermarket clerk, who believes he's solved the riddle of time travel.

programme.title: The To Do List, (2013, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Valedictorian, Brandy wants to get "educated" before college, so she assembles a list of all the sexual activities she missed out on. Quickly realizing that she's way out of her league, Brandy solicits her sister and burn-out boss for their help.

programme.title: Georgia Rule, (2007, Screwball)
programme.desc: A troubled young woman is sent to live with her grandmother for the summer, while hiding a secret that could potentially tear her family apart.

programme.title: Uptown Girls, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Molly Gunn is the daughter of a late rock legend, and the toast of New York City. But when her inheritance is stolen, Molly is forced to do something she's never done before - get a job. Molly becomes a nanny to a girl, who is "eight going on forty."

programme.title: Heartbreakers, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

programme.title: A Little Bit of Heaven, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A young woman (Kate Hudson) who uses her humor to avoid intimacy has a life-changing visit from her doctor in this divinely funny dramatic comedy. With Whoopi Goldberg and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman, (2007, Romance)
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: Julie & Julia, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Julie & Julia, tells the true stories of how Julia Child's life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking.

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub is heading for the U.S. coast; however, one CIA analyst thinks the captain will defect the submarine, and he only has hours to prove it.

programme.title: Wild Things, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon, Matt Dillon and Neve Campbell star in a steamy story of murder, intrigue and sex. Rated: R

programme.title: Shutter Island, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: When U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels arrives at the asylum for the criminally insane on Shutter Island, he uncovers terrifying truths about the island and finds out some places never let you go.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan must quickly evolve from soldier to analyst to full-fledged operative to stop a devastating terrorist plot against the United States.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub is heading for the U.S. coast; however, one CIA analyst thinks the captain will defect the submarine, and he only has hours to prove it.

programme.title: Only the Brave, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: Only the Brave, based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, is the heroic story of a team of local firefighters who through hope, determination, and sacrifice become one of the most elite firefighting teams in the nation.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Hyena Road, (2015, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Three men, three different paths, caught in conflict but brought together to save lives: a highly skilled sniper who cant think of his targets as human, an intelligence officer who has never killed while on duty.

programme.title: Of Mice and Men, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: John Malkovich, Gary Sinise and Sherilyn Fenn shine in this contemporary remake of the beloved classic about a nomadic farm worker who looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Footloose, (1984, Romance)
programme.desc: A rebellious city boy finds himself in an uptight Midwestern town where dancing and therefore all youthful joy has been banned.

programme.title: The Other Boleyn Girl, (2008, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Two sisters, Anne and Mary, are driven by their ambitious family to seduce the king of England in order to advance their position in court. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Buffalo Bill and the Indians, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Buffalo Bill has fought Indians & Civil War battles, but nothing can prepare him for show business! When he signs Sitting Bull for a role in his Wild West Show, the clash of cultures reverberates far beyond the boundaries of their sprawling theater.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prisonin the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Lawless, (2012, Crime)
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, and Jessica Chastain star in this adaptation of 'The Wettest County in the World.' A bootlegging gang make a run for the American Dream during Prohibition.

programme.title: Small Soldiers, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Joe Dante directed this satirical action-comedy about talking tech toys accidentally juiced-up with military microchips.

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction, (2014, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay comes the best 'Transformers' ever! With humanity facing extinction from a terrifying new threat, it's up to the Autobots to save Earth. They'll need new allies, including inventor Cade (Mark Wahlberg) and the Dinobots!

programme.title: Small Soldiers, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Joe Dante directed this satirical action-comedy about talking tech toys accidentally juiced-up with military microchips.

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: Love and Monsters, (2020, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In a monster-infested world, Joel (Dylan O'Brien) learns his high school sweetheart (Jessica Henwick) is just 80 miles away. Now, Joel must discover his inner hero, facing unknown dangers on the impossible journey to be with the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction, (2014, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay comes the best 'Transformers' ever! With humanity facing extinction from a terrifying new threat, it's up to the Autobots to save Earth. They'll need new allies, including inventor Cade (Mark Wahlberg) and the Dinobots!

programme.title: Julie & Julia, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Julie & Julia, tells the true stories of how Julia Child's life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking.

programme.title: The Great Buck Howard, (2009, Classics)
programme.desc: Once upon a time, Buck Howard (John Malkovich) spent his days in the limelight as a mentalist extraordinaire! Nowadays, its clear to everyone except Buck that his act has lost its luster. Convinced his comeback is imminen.

programme.title: Jane Got a Gun, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: The Girl in the Spider's Web, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander and journalist Mikael Blomkvist find themselves caught in a web of spies, cybercriminals, and corrupt government officials.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: The Master, (2012, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Haunted by his past, WW-II veteran and drifter Freddie Quell (Joaquin Phoenix) crosses paths with a mysterious movement led by The Master (Phillip Seymour Hoffman) and his wife (Amy Adams).

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part VI: Jason Lives, (1986, Slashers and Serial Killers)
