programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Trafalgar Law waits for the right moment to make his move, Blackbeard is pursued by powerful marines, and Chopper makes a surprising return to the land of gargantuan birds!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: PIRATES GET ON THE MOVE! ASTOUNDING NEW WORLD!

programme.title: Nami uses her feminine charms to learn about the New World weather. Franky moves into Dr. Vegapunk's laboratory, and Sanji must fight to stay out of a cute dress!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LIVING THROUGH HELL! SANJI'S FIGHT FOR HIS MANHOOD!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue preparations for their voyage to the New World as Robin heads for a meeting with the Revolutionary Dragon. Usopp aspires to become King of the Snipers, and Zoro begs his mortal enemy to train him!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WILL GET MUCH, MUCH STRONGER! ZORO'S PLEDGE TO HIS CAPTAIN!

programme.title: Dark King Rayleigh takes Luffy to a deadly, deserted island for two years of intense battle training! If the Straw Hat captain wants to survive in the New World, he'll have to hone his hidden powers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TRAINING BEGINS! TO THE PLACE WE PROMISED IN 2 YEARS!

programme.title: After two years of rigorous training, the new and improved Straw Hats make their way to Sabaody Archipelago, but their long-awaited reunion is spoiled by a villainous gang of imposters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BEGINNING OF THE NEW CHAPTER! THE STRAW HATS REUNITED!

programme.title: Luffy picks a fight with himself, Chopper falls in with a dubious crowd of imitation pirates, and Zorro causes a commotion when he falls asleep on the wrong ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EXPLOSIVE SITUATION! LUFFY VS. FAKE LUFFY!

programme.title: Chopper struggles to make sense of the changes his "friends" have undergone in the last two years, and the Navy mobilizes in an attempt to stop the pirate posers. Will the real Straw Hats please stand up?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NAVY HAS SET OUT! THE STRAW HATS IN DANGER!

programme.title: Chopper and Usopp flip over Franky's new body, Brook must choose between rock-n-roll stardom and the life of a pirate, and Luffy wanders into a very dangerous crowd!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BIG GUNS ASSEMBLED! THE DANGER OF THE FAKE STRAW HATS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats prepare to set sail, Luffy gets a chance to show off his new powers in a brutal throw down between notorious pirates, navy soldiers, and deadly Pacifistas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IS ON! SHOW THEM WHAT YOU GOT FROM TRAINING!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew are finally reunited, but before they can set sail, they'll need help from Dark King Rayleigh, Boa Hancock, and all the friends they've made in the last two years!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVERYONE TOGETHER! LUFFY, SETTING OUT FOR THE NEW WORLD!

programme.title: As word of the Straw Hat resurrection spreads through the Navy, Luffy and his crew get acclimated to their underwater environment, and Franky reveals the startling identity of the man who protected their ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SURPRISING FACT! THE MAN WHO GUARDED THE SUNNY!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are attacked by a rival gang of pirates, but that may be the least of their worries. Luffy and his crew are on a collision course with a cantankerous Kraken!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DEADLY COMBAT UNDER THE SEA! THE DEMON OF THE OCEAN STRIKES!

programme.title: After their quarrel with the Kraken, the Straw Hats find themselves in hot water as Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji turn up missing, and the rest of the crew runs short on air!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOST IN THE DEEP SEA! THE STRAW HATS GET SEPARATED!

programme.title: Thanks to a little help from a friend, Luffy saves his mates from a ghost ship captained by a deranged Dutchman! Unfortunately, their happy reunion is cut short by a volcanic eruption! Can the Hats take the heat?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: UNDERSEA VOLCANIC ERUPTION! DRIFTING TO THE FISHMAN ISLAND!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally make it to Fish-Man Island, but their reputation precedes them, leading to trouble with the New Fish-Man Pirates! Only a daring maneuver can get them out of hot water, but there's no guarantee they'll survive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING AT THE FISHMAN ISLAND! BEAUTIFUL MERMAIDS!

programme.title: When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXCITEMENT BLOW-OUT! SANJI'S LIFE UNDER THREAT!

programme.title: When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FISHMAN ISLAND WILL BE ANNIHILATED?! SHARLEY'S PROPHECY!

programme.title: After two generous donors save Sanji from death by nosebleed, Luffy and Usopp take a tour of the island. But their welcome is worn out when a mystic mermaid has a terrifying visionthat Fish-Man Island will be destroyed at the hands of a Straw Hat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE KING OF THE FISHMAN ISLAND! NEPTUNE, THE GOD OF THE SEA!

programme.title: After reuniting with Nami, Luffy and the gang are invited to the royal palace of Neptune, god of the sea! Meanwhile, the New Fish-Man Pirates exploit the power of a designer steroid in order to terrorize humans!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE RYUGU PALACE! TAKEN BY THE SHARK THAT THEY SAVED!

programme.title: A trio of unsuspecting mermaids find themselves in hot water after releasing a bad guy from his barrel of a prison. Over at the royal palace, Luffy gets up close and personal with the Mermaid Princess!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A COWARD AND A CRYBABY! THE PRINCESS IN THE HARD SHELL TOWER!

programme.title: Luffy's lightning reflexes spare the Mermaid Princess from a grisly death, Neptune's army attempts to apprehend the Straw Hats, and Captain Vander Decken forges a sinister undersea alliance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IT'S AN EMERGENCY! THE RYUGU PALACE IS OCCUPIED!

programme.title: With their backs against the wall, the Straw Hats are forced to take King Neptune and his men hostage. On the other side of the palace, Luffy and the Mermaid Princess make plans to visit the Sea Forrest!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE RYUGU PALACE IN SHOCK! THE KIDNAPPING OF SHIRAHOSHI!

programme.title: Luffy accidentally "kidnaps" the Mermaid Princess, an old friend issues a grave warning to Chopper and Sanji, and the New Fish-Man Pirates prepare for a raid on Ryugu Palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HORDY'S ONSLAUGHT! THE RETALIATORY PLAN SET INTO MOTION!

programme.title: Captain Vander Decken and Hordy Jones manage to successfully breach the defenses of Ryugu Palace. Meanwhile, Jimbei waits patiently for Luffy to arrive at the Sea Forest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IN RYUGU PALACE! ZORO VS. HORDY!

programme.title: Robin ventures into the forest in search of ancient secrets, Zoro takes to the water for a slicing, dicing showdown with Hordy Jones, and Luffy is branded a royal kidnapper by an angry mob of fish folk!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KEEP SHIRAHOSHI SAFE! DECKEN CLOSE BEHIND!

programme.title: Luffy, Chopper, and Sanji are taken prisoner by a fish mob just as Vander Decken launches an attack the princess! Elsewhere, Zoro continues his battle with Hordy, and Nami hitches a ride on a mermaid to escape the crumbling palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HATS DEFEATED?! HORDY GAINS CONTROL OF THE RYUGU PALACE!

programme.title: Zoro and Neptune fight bravely, but they're no match for Hordy and his pill-popping minions. Back at the ship, Luffy reunites with Jimbei, who reveals something sinister about his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE HAUNTING TIES! NAMI AND THE FISHMAN PIRATES!

programme.title: The New Fish-Man Pirates continue their bloody and violent uprising, and Jimbei begins the story of how he unleashed the monster known as Arlong on the unsuspecting citizens of the East Blue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A HERO WHO FREED THE SLAVES! AN ADVENTURER TIGER!

programme.title: Jimbei continues his story with tales of fish-men taken as slaves, Queen Otohime's fierce devotion to her people, the legend of Fisher Tiger, and the sinister rise of Arlong.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KIZARU APPEARS! A TRAP TO CATCH TIGER!

programme.title: Arlong's violent tendencies are condemned by Fisher Tiger, and the arrival of a young human girl teaches the Fish-Man Pirates a lesson in compassion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Team is Formed! Save Chopper

programme.title: The great pirate Fisher Tiger keeps his promise to a young slave girl, but the adults in her village are determined to make him pay for his act of honor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DEATH OF THE HERO! A SHOCKING TRUTH OF TIGER!

programme.title: In the wake of Fisher Tiger's tragic death, the once-mighty Sun Pirates are splintered by an ongoing quarrel between Jimbei and Arlong. Meanwhile, Queen Otohime's ceasless quest to help her people begins to take its toll.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SUN PIRATES SPLIT! JIMBEI VS. ARLONG!

programme.title: Tensions run high when a slave-owning Celestial Dragon washes up on Fish-Man Island. His former captives cry for out for blood, but Queen Otohime sees it as a chance to mend fences between the gilled and non-gilled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHAKING FISHMAN ISLAND! A CELESTIAL DRAGON DRIFTS IN!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Goemon, siding with the Shiranami Five, challenges Lupin to a one-on-one duel. While Goemon keeps Lupin busy, the Shiranami Five steals the 36 Views, but one of its members, Kikuko Benten, betrays her gang and escapes with the loot.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a wild whim, Inspector Zenigata swipes a throwing coin owned by his great Edo-era ancestor, Heiji Zenigata while he's viewing the inside of an incredible new safe protected by Professor Hunter's super computer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are after the Aurora Droplet, a diamond adorning a prima ballerina's tiara. During the heist, Jigen is wounded and in a twist of fate, is saved by Monica, the prima ballerina.
programme.sub-title: The Face of Goodbye at the National Border

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After shaking off Inspector Zenigata's pursuit, Lupin is stopped by a monstrously huge Fujiko on his way home! The giant Fujiko turns out to be an illusion created by Madame X. Lupin learns Madame X's hobby is collecting famous people.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious World of Madame X

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Bandit leader Basara is determined to sniff out the location of the diamonds Lupin has hidden somewhere in India. Armed with his sinister invention, the Suicide Ray Gun, he tries to make Lupin talk, even trying his luck with a fake Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Trouble is all but guaranteed when a crime boss and an arms merchant join hands. The two set their eyes on Goemen's sword, which can split a tank in half! After hiring Fujiko to steal it, they transform the sword into an invincible flying weapon of war.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen and Gomen have sent a letter saying they are being held captive in a small but terrifying village. Lupin arrives in the village to rescue them, but Jigen and Goemon are acting oddly.
programme.sub-title: The Sound of the Devil's Bell Calls Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Don Kecchi, the wealthiest man in America, is terminally ill and has announced that he's donating his entire fortune to charity. However, Lupin steals Kecchi's money and shoots Fujiko right in front of Inspector Zenigata!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Margaret Tiffany, the owner of Tiffany's and a TV anchor, hires Lupin and his gang to rob her jewelry store on live TV. Initially, Lupin refuses, but ends up having to go through with it thanks to Fujiko's wild spending habits.
programme.sub-title: Christmas is in the Goddess' Hands

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A princess of a small Silk Road country has been kidnapped. Lupin and his gang are persuaded to rescue Princess Yasmin in exchange for a stomach full of holy curry meant for the gods. However, the kidnapping was a trap to lure Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Here comes Beauty, the assassin hired by ICPO Headquarters to knock off Lupin! Overwhelmed by Beauty's powerful DumDum bullets, Lupin narrowly escapes with his life thanks to Jigen's quick thinking.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang head to the isolated country of Kimasan, after hearing the country possesses mountains of treasure. They sneak across the border but are quickly captured by Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the giants who rule the country.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's Great Journey to the West

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Casino Paradise is an artificial island owned and operated by Domino, a casino tycoon. Domino decides to run for President and brags that with $500 million to spend, the only way he can lose is if Lupin steals his campaign funds!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Political fixer Pomade Jaws trusts no one, not even his wife Laura. He's stored the scandalous secrets of various world leaders inside a voice-activated safe.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Pops Fell in Love With

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen and Goemon have turned themselves in to the FBI, but it's all part of the plan. Their real goal is to break out old man Clyde Barlow, who was once known as a genius bank robber, to get his help with their heist of the National Super Bank.
programme.sub-title: A Classical Thief and a Myna

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Isamu Kondo III, grandson of the leader of the Shinsengumi, hires Lupin and his gang to recover a golden cannon sunk by the Shogunate forces in the Tsugaru Strait. After much effort, the valuable golden cannon is finally recovered from the deep ocean.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Ellery Queen, the owner of the legendary sapphire called "The Eye of Solomon," is also the owner of a football team. Lupin, coming for the sapphire as announced, discovers Queen on the brink of death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The 3rd Thieves Olympic is about to be held in Japan, and Lupin and Jigen are in it to win it! After winning the first and second Thieves Olympic, if they also win this year's getaway race, they'll become the first-ever Triple-Crown winners!
programme.sub-title: Through the Flowers or Storms, The Thieves Race

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The world's largest diamond has been discovered in South Africa and Lupin has his eyes on the prize. But as it turns out, stealing it is the easy part!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko decides to marry Huffner for his jewelry collection, disregarding the rumor that Huffner's brides always die a mysterious death within a few weeks of their wedding. Turns out, he's also a collector of brides and likes them permanently preserved!
programme.sub-title: A Wedding Dress Doesn't Suit Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen receives a letter from Sister Angelica and heads to the African country of Borodias. Sister Angelica wants Jigen's help to rescue Dr. Othello, the leader of the country's independence movement.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO tries a different approach to capturing Lupin: Astrology. It enlists the help of Marianne, a clairvoyant who can read Lupin's actions using astrological predictions and her crystal ball.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko calls Lupin from Professor Pot's lab, but since Lupin is half-asleep, Jigen takes the call instead. Fujiko claims Professor Pot has accidentally invented a robot that manufactures diamonds, but Jigen doesn't believe a word she says and hangs up.
programme.sub-title: Diamon's Shining in the Robot's Eye

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko has invited Lupin and company to a classical concert conducted by Kyoransky from the International Philharmonic. After they get a good look at Kyoransky's baton, studded with a a diamond worth at least 200 million yen.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes to prison intent on making Silver tell what he did with the loot, only to discover that a new top-of-the-line prison was built over the site where he hid the money. Will the operation to trade an execution for the recovery of the money succeed?
programme.sub-title: The Last Gift in Prison is Cup Ramen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the Golden Bell, symbol of the monarchy of Beltenberg and precious tourist attraction. However, the bell that sparkles in the belfry is just a brass replica.
programme.sub-title: Fujiko, Men are A Sorry Lot!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata is taken hostage from ICPO headquarters. The terrorists demand to swap him with their boss Napoleon XI, but ICPO refuses. Since Zenigata is no further use to them, the terrorists are bound to kill him; but Lupin is to the rescue?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Smith Gang hit-man company was once the best in the business, but they're suffering now from tough competition. Though the company chairman Smith considers running TV ads to revive his business, he can't think of a good way to do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joe Spade was once a formidable hitman of renown and Jigen's sharpshooter coach, he now comes to beg for Jigen's help; he had gotten old, flubbed a hit contract, and is now on the run.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: ICPO Bureau Chief Jasmine is an able commissioner. She uses the governor to spur Zenigata into action, as she has a secret plan to arrest Lupin. But Jasmine's plan is to make this mission her very last at ICPO so she could get married.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Nightlight Mask murdered the Duke of Le Mond and stole his diamonds. ICPO is having trouble solving the case, so they induct mystery author Conan Dorill as a special inspector. Dorill deduces that the true identity of Nightlight Mask is Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix's Tear had been stolen. Lupin's been caught on security cameras, but he has no recollection of having done the deed.
programme.sub-title: When the Devil Calls to Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's target is the Vatican Crown, located at the North Pole. He devises a plan to thwart pesky Fujiko, which is to relocate penguins at the South Pole to the North Pole.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's North Pole, South Pole Adventures

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: The Raid: Redemption, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies a drug-gangs safe house, home to some of the most terrifying and ruthless fighters in the city. Arriving before dawn, an elite swat team moves in to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Dubbed), (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: Buffalo Girls, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Based on Larry McMurtry's best-selling novel which celebrates the bold escapades of Calamity Jane and her illustrious cohorts, as they travel the wild west in search of her long-lost daughter and the west they once knew.

programme.title: Buffalo Girls, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Based on Larry McMurtry's best-selling novel which celebrates the bold escapades of Calamity Jane and her illustrious cohorts, as they travel the wild west in search of her long-lost daughter and the west they once knew.

programme.title: Along Came Jones, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: Doc, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: The Broken Star, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: A marshal murders a rancher for gold, but is foiled by his assistant.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Return Of Sabata, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Running Scared, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: In the fast-paced crime drama Running Scared, Paul Walker plays a low-level mobster who, in order to save his family, must recover a gun used in a mob hit before it's found by his bosses or the cops.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Junebug, (2005, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Rising stars Amy Adams and Ben McKenzie light up the screen in this award-winning comedy about love, family, ambition, and the choices that come with each. When worldly art dealer Madeleine (Embeth Davidtz) meets her new Southern in-laws. Rated: R

programme.title: Saving Face, (2005, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A Chinese-American lesbian and her traditionalist mother are reluctant to go public with secret loves that clash against cultural expectations.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: Sunshine Cleaning, (2009, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Former high school cheerleading captain Rose (Amy Adams) is a thirty-something single mother who cleans houses for a living. Wanting to send her trouble-making son Oscar to a private school, Rose decides to take her married lover's (Steve Zahn) advice.

programme.title: Instant Family, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children

programme.title: Playing with Fire, (2019, Screwball)
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: A new weapon in the Savior arsenal proves to be a giant hurdle as fighting continues between Rick's forces and those of the Saviors.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A close look at Negan and the lives of the Saviors during the conflict through a familiar set of eyes.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: With things looking up for Rick and the group, an argument breaks out at the Hilltop; the consequences of the decision are life versus death.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: The King, the Widow, and Rick

programme.title: Negan has to enlist the help of his lieutenants in solving a huge issue facing the Sanctuary; Rick and the group continue to enact the plan.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Every story and battle from the first half of the season comes crashing together in this action-packed, emotional mid-season finale.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick faces new difficulties after a battle; the fight continues in other communities as core members face hard decisions.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Groups unite their forces and converge on the Hilltop; Aaron and Enid search for allies; Simon takes matters into his own hands.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl finds himself in bad company as his group heads to the Hilltop; Maggie makes difficult decisions at the Hilltop; Gabriel's faith becomes tested.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Hilltop's leadership faces a difficult dilemma after the arrival of unexpected visitors; Rick comes face to face with an adversary.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Trouble arises when unexpected visitors arrive at the Hilltop and the community is thrust into action; heartbreaking discoveries are made.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

Sem nenhuma explicao de como isso ocorreu, decide procurar a famlia dele com a ideia de que o filho mesmo do rapaz, mas com isso acabar descobrindo a verdade sobre tudo.

programme.title: A noite dos mortos
programme.desc: Halloween em 1997, e tambm a ltima noite na escola para dois adolescentes skatistas, que vo deixar para trs a fase escolar e adentrar na famosa fase adulta. programme.desc: A jovem e talentosa artista Noni Jean (Gugu Mbatha-Raw) alcana a sonhada fama, mas no consegue lidar muito bem com as complexidades do estrelato e sucumbe ante a presso da vida pblica. At sua vida ser salva por Kaz Nicol (Nate Parker), um policial designado a proteg-la, que pode ser a pea chave que faltava para desbloquear o potencial artistco dela. programme.desc: Uma terapeuta de casais, feliz no casamento, descobre que os pais esto se divorciando e tudo sai do controle.

programme.desc: Na mesma ideia de "Sob o Sol da Toscana", James largou o emprego e seguiu seu sonho, que o levou a Espanha.

programme.desc: Uma terapeuta matrimonial tenta consertar seu prprio casamento concentrando-se em como mudar seu marido.

programme.desc: Jogador de beisebol Miquias Matias e seu filho Bobby se acabar na pitoresca comunidade Amish de Sugarcreek, Ohio em um conjunto de aliases. Trs Amish irms execuo de uma antiga quinta inn lev-los debaixo das suas asas, e empregar Mica como um faz-tudo.

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperana
programme.desc: Esta a histria de Anglica, uma garota de 16 anos que est lutando contra um tipo raro de cncer chamado Sndrome Mielodisplsica, sua luta para tentar viver uma vida normal e sua esperana de encontrar seu primeiro amor antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: A Lenda do Mestre Chins
programme.desc: A histria do filme baseada em uma lenda chinesa e gira em torno de um jovem estudante (Raymond Lam) que se apaixona por uma bela mulher (Huang Shengyi), sem saber que ela uma cobra branca que assumiu a forma humana.

programme.title: Crimes Cruzados
programme.desc: As complicaes surgem durante uma situao perigosa de refm em um restaurante.

programme.title: Motoqueiro Fantasma: Esprito de Vingana
programme.desc: Nove anos aps se transformar no temido Motoqueiro Fantasma, Johnny Blaze se refugia para tentar controlar sua maldio e deix-la escondida da maioria das pessoas. Ele leva uma vida solitria, at ser obrigado a entrar em ao novamente.

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe um assassino que est na Tailndia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos so inimigos de Surat, um chefo do crime local. Para no ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: Linha de ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3
programme.desc: Frank Martin obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agncia de Proteo Ambiental da Ucrnia, de Marselha a Odessa, alm de dois sacos de contedo suspeito.

programme.title: O Rei das Armas
programme.desc: Um criminoso se rene com um velho amigo aps uma troca de armas fracassada.

programme.title: Soldado Universal 3: Regenerao
programme.desc: Um soldado ressuscitado e geneticamente modificado enfrenta seus inimigos, contratados por terroristas nucleares.

programme.title: A Equipe da Noite
programme.desc: Um grupo de caadores de recompensas forado a passar a noite em um motel no deserto mexicano. L eles descobriro que sua protegida, uma mulher chinesa, muito mais do que ela deixa transparecer.

programme.title: Vice: A Mquina
programme.desc: Julian Michaels um consagrado designer cuja obra maior Vice, um resort onde as pessoas podem fazer absolutamente tudo o que desejar, sem se ater a leis ou regras, j que apenas convive com robs travestidos de humanos.

programme.title: O Resgate
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria real, uma equipe da SWAT encarregada de atacar um avio da Air France sequestrado para salvar seus passageiros.

programme.title: A Casa Silenciosa
programme.desc: Uma jovem fica presa dentro do refgio beira do lago de sua famlia e se torna incapaz de entrar em contato com o mundo exterior enquanto foras sobrenaturais assombram a casa com energias e consequncias misteriosas.

programme.title: Armadilha
programme.desc: Sonhando em fugir de sua cidade natal, Amber convence seus amigos a fazer uma pausa. Quando o carro quebra, eles concordam em deixar um homem peg-los mais tarde e descobrem que o veculo est cheio de caixas manchadas de sangue.

programme.title: Leprechaun: A Origem
programme.desc: Dois jovens casais viajando pela Irlanda descobrem que uma das lendas mais famosas da Irlanda uma aterrorizante realidade.

programme.title: Ecos do Alm 2
programme.desc: Um soldado volta para casa do Iraque, assombrado pelos fantasmas daqueles que viu morrer.

programme.title: Cuidado com Quem Chama
programme.desc: Seis amigos atraem a ateno de uma presena demonaca durante uma sesso online e comeam a notar ocorrncias estranhas nas suas casas.

programme.title: Halloween III: A Noite das Bruxas

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar - S1E0
programme.desc: Um jovem delinquente do ensino mdio obrigado a ser o tutor de uma escola de baixa renda. L, ele se apaixona pela filha do pastor e vive uma paixo cheia de diferenas e surpresas.

programme.title: O Reino Gelado 3 - Fogo e Gelo - S1E0
programme.desc: O raro talento de se meter em problemas o legado da famlia de Kai e Gerda. Crescidos, os irmos se metem em um desastre de propores globais, tudo para encontrar seus pais que esto desaparecidos aps serem levados pelo Vento do Norte.

programme.title: A academia de Jiraya no vai muito bem e surge uma nova academia de ninjas. A diretora da escola Morgana e aprisiona todas as crianas reprovadas para entrar na escola. O que ser que ela est tramando? Jiraya conseguir salvar as crianas?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E39

programme.title: Um homem misterioso surge diante de Issamu, que est em busca de Hitomi. Ele se chama Joe Kazumi, que fugiu do Imprio Crisis.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E16

programme.title: Issamu, Joe e Shigeru so capturados e levados para o templo da Princesa Garonia. Maribaron ordena que Joe e Shigeru sejam eliminados.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E17

programme.title: Shigeru quer observar esquilos-voadores que atingem 10 mil metros de altura no cu. Porm, um esquilo em especfico chama a ateno de Issamu e Joe.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E18

programme.title: Nascem dois sis em Tquio, mais uma operao malfica em movimento pelo Imprio Crisis.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E19

programme.title: Bancos so roubados e uma nica prova do crime intriga a polcia: cascos de bananas. Issamu e Joe Kazumi levam o caso a srio e tentam bolar um plano para atrair algum aficcionado por bananas.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E20

programme.title: Mais fugitivos do grupo de Resistncia do Imprio Crisis caminham rumo Terra. Desta vem quem aparece diante de Issamu e Joe Clia, antiga namorada de Joe.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E21

programme.title: Passos inquietantes ecoam no deserto da morte. A Shadow Moon, o inimigo mais poderoso e imortal de todos, voltou. Shadow Moon faz um pacto obscuro com o General Jark.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E22

programme.title: Masao presencia um acidente envolvendo soldados do Imprio Crisis e eles deixam cair um controle remoto em formato de teclado que possui habilidades ocultas. Pessoas comeam a ter a aparncia modificada uma atrs da outra e Issamu estuda o caso.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E23

programme.title: O pai de Hakyo continua agindo de forma estranha... O plano de Gadorian para alimentar a Comunidade Camila, transformando-os em comida para monstros, que envolve o Monstro Kaima Lickpack, ativa a ira de Issamu.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX - S1E24

programme.title: Jack Reacher (2012)
programme.desc: A defense attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October (1990)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: The Untouchables (1987)
programme.desc: Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness attempts to take Al Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy Citys police force.

programme.title: Frank Millers Sin City (2005)
programme.desc: Lawmen, prostitutes (Devon Aoki, Alexis Bledel), a hulking thug and other sordid characters run amok in a crime-ridden metropolis.

programme.title: The Courier (2020)
programme.desc: Recruited by MI6, British businessman Greville Wynne works with Soviet spy Oleg Penkovsky to obtain intelligence on the Cuban Missile Crisis.

programme.title: A Perfect Day (2015)
programme.desc: Aid workers (Benicio del Toro, Tim Robbins, Olga Kurylenko) in the Balkans try to retrieve a mans body from a well before it contaminates the water for nearby villagers.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard (Kristen Stewart) at Guantanamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: The Four Feathers (2002)
programme.desc: Accused of cowardice for resigning when assigned to a dangerous post, a former British soldier (Heath Ledger) tries to help his old regiment fight rebels in Africa.

programme.title: Allied (2016)
programme.desc: World War II operative Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) falls for French Resistance fighter Marianne Beausejour (Marion Cotillard) during a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Reunited in London, a devastating secret tests their love and loyalty to each other.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker (2002)
programme.desc: The commander (Harrison Ford) of a Russian submarine tries to avert a disaster after a nuclear reactor malfunctions.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: Recurring nightmares of the planet Mars lead a confused earthling into the center of an intergalactic conspiracy.

programme.title: Gangs of New York (2002)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Halls sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America (1984)
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Time in America (1984)
programme.desc: Sergio Leones portrait of the friendships, loyalties and betrayals among Jewish gangsters in the 1920s and 30s.

programme.title: Panama (2022)
programme.desc: A defense contractor hires an ex-marine to go to Panama to complete an arms deal. In the process, he becomes involved in the U.S. invasion of Panama.

programme.title: The Wrath of Becky (2023)
programme.desc: When a violent group known as the Noble Men breaks into Beckys house and takes her beloved dog, she must return to her old ways to protect herself and her loved ones.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow (1999)
programme.desc: Constable Ichabod Crane is sent to the village of Sleepy Hollow, where a headless horseman is leaving a trail of decapitated bodies.

programme.title: Monstrous (2022)
programme.desc: A terrifying new horror awaits Laura and her 7-year-old son, Cody, when they flee her abusive ex-husband and try to settle into a new life. Still traumatized, their fragile existence is pushed to the breaking point.

programme.title: I.S.S. (2023)
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard (Kristen Stewart) at Guantanamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: The Fifth Estate (2013)
programme.desc: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange (Benedict Cumberbatch) and his colleague, Daniel Domscheit-Berg (Daniel Bruhl), provide a platform for whistle-blowers to leak covert data anonymously and expose government secrets and corporate crimes.

programme.title: Cloud Atlas (2012)
programme.desc: With the consequences of their actions, individuals impact one anothers lives throughout the past, present and future.

programme.title: Mercy (2023)
programme.desc: An ex-military doctor finds herself in a fight for survival when the Irish mafia seizes control of the hospital at which she works. When her son is taken hostage, shes forced to rely on her battle-hardened past and lethal skills to save the day.

programme.title: Strange Darling (2023)
programme.desc: Nothing is what it seems when a twisted one-night stand spirals into a serial killers vicious murder spree.

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe (2016)
programme.desc: When father and son coroners investigate the death of a beautiful "Jane Doe," they find increasingly bizarre clues.

programme.title: Backcountry (2014)
programme.desc: A couple (Missy Peregrym, Jeff Roop) on a deep-wilderness hike become hopelessly lost within an aggressive black bears territory.

programme.title: Erotic Couture (2022)
programme.desc: When a fashion mogul dies, his nurse is elevated to president of the company, leading to a hilarious power struggle.

programme.title: Gods Petting You (2022)
programme.desc: A heroin addict falls in love with a struggling sex addict, and together the pair hatch a plan to steal a small fortune from a porn star.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: Citizen Bio
programme.desc: Exploring in depth the nascent biohacking movement and the unconventional scientists and researchers developing alternative medicines to prolong human life and eradicate incurable viruses and diseases.

programme.title: Rolling Like Thunder
programme.desc: Stories of myth-like artists, remarkable romances and competitive battles reveal the risk behind freight train and graffiti culture.

programme.title: The Free World (2016)
programme.desc: Released from prison for a crime he didnt commit, a man (Boyd Holbrook) goes on the run with a woman (Elisabeth Moss) whos suspected of killing her abusive husband.

programme.title: Hide and Seek (2021)
programme.desc: When a wealthy businessman follows a lead to find his missing brother, he dives headlong into a twisted underworld of squatters and vagrants that threatens to tear apart his family as he struggles to maintain his sanity.

programme.title: Rounders (1998)
programme.desc: The release of his debt-ridden pal (Edward Norton) from jail spurs a law student (Matt Damon) to resume high-stakes gambling.

programme.title: The Gambler (2014)
programme.desc: A literature professor (Mark Wahlberg) with gambling debts borrows money from a mobster (Michael Kenneth Williams) and offers his life as collateral while immersing himself in an illicit, underground world.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker (2002)
programme.desc: The commander (Harrison Ford) of a Russian submarine tries to avert a disaster after a nuclear reactor malfunctions.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate (2019)
programme.desc: Seasoned warrior Sarah Connor joins forces with a hybrid cyborg human and the T-800 model to protect a young woman from the Rev-9 -- a newly modified and seemingly indestructible liquid Terminator from the future.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs (1992)
programme.desc: Thieves (Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen) ponder the identity of the traitor in their midst in the violent aftermath of a failed jewelry heist.

programme.title: The Untouchables (1987)
programme.desc: Though Prohibition agent Eliot Ness attempts to take Al Capone down, even his best efforts fail due to widespread corruption within the Windy Citys police force.

programme.title: The Machinist (2004)
programme.desc: Cryptic notes and encounters with a mysterious stranger torment a drill-press operator (Christian Bale) who has not slept in a year.

programme.title: Killshot (2009)
programme.desc: A veteran assassin (Mickey Rourke) and his young partner (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) pursue a couple (Diane Lane, Thomas Jane) who stumbled upon an extortion scheme and entered the Witness Protection Program.

programme.title: Run and Gun (2021)
programme.desc: A former criminal gets blackmailed into one last job to collect a mysterious package. After a deadly double-cross, he soon finds himself wounded and on the run from ruthless assassins who will stop at nothing to get what he has.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies (2015)
programme.desc: During the Cold War, a CIA operative (Scott Shepherd) recruits New York lawyer James Donovan (Tom Hanks) to negotiate a prisoner exchange for captured U.S. pilot Francis Gary Powers (Austin Stowell).

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.

programme.title: First Blood (1982)
programme.desc: Green Beret veteran Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) takes on a Pacific Northwest sheriff (Brian Dennehy) and the National Guard.

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: A hot-shot Navy jet pilot (Tom Cruise) tangles with MiGs and flirts with a civilian astrophysicist (Kelly McGillis).

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates (2001)
programme.desc: A Nazi sniper (Ed Harris) travels to Stalingrad to find and kill a Russian sharpshooter (Jude Law), the hero of the propaganda campaign of a political officer (Joseph Fiennes).
